page.title: 08ALVES CLUBS AND ASSOCIATIONS
page.content: Youth Club. Meets Wednesday School Hall. Secretary - Mrs.J. Taylor. Badminton Club. Meets Tuesday School Hall. Secretary _ Mr.Clarihew. Ladies Club. Meets Thursday Church Hall. Secretary _ Mrs.Philpot. Guild Association. Meets Church Hall. Secretary _ Mrs.Musturd. Amenities Association. Meets School. Secretary _ Mr.Clarihew. Keep Fit Group. Meets Wednesday Drill Hall. Secretary _ Mrs. McIntosh. Parent Teacher Association. Meets school. Secretary Mr. K. D. Holland. Bowlers CLUB. Meets Drill Hall. Secretary Mr. F. Symon. Playgroup. Meets Alves Primary School on Monday, Wednesday and Friday.
